code: import React from"react";import Title from"./Title";import{services}from"../Data";import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function Services(){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("section",{className:"section services",id:"services",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Title,{title:"our",subTitle:"services"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"section-center services-center",children:services.map(function(service){var id=service.id,icon=service.icon,title=service.title,text=service.text;return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("article",{className:"service",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"service-icon",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("i",{className:icon})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"service-info",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h4",{className:"service-title",children:title}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"service-text",children:text})]})]},id);})})]});}export default Services;
